name: Pumpking (Dídac Campos Milian, 0Zaddy0, Rocooo)
description:
After Lord Parsnip attack, all veggie villagers in the kingdom are turning into zombie vampires. This rare disease is also affecting to the Pumpking King who is gradually getting weaker. But it is not too late yet! Follow Pumpking across the greenhouse to defeat the evil lord and get the deserved revenge for the Veggie kingdom.
